messages.message: even deleting the sandbox and rebasing on master doesn’t work, maybe there’s something weird with this PR

hmm how strange :open_mouth:

this PR has minimal changes to the existing Build UI, right? would you feel confident enough to force. merge?
yes the only changes to existing build UI are regarding derived fields, which I’ve updated the test plan to have new gifs for. It’s safe to merge.
What kind of sandbox is this? (I’m not at my computer or I’d look myself)
this is a crafting cypress CI sandbox, so it uses the `cypress-ci` template

yeah i've never seen this before :confused_dog:

and i have no idea why we're referring to that deleted makefile target since Danny's PR's branch is also pretty up-to-date

could the `cypress-ci` template somehow be using code from an old branch? :question-block:
This template has been working for months since that change was made. So this is quite odd. I wonder if something changed about the template instead of the git repo.
If folks are still blocked tomorrow, I can take a look too.
we'll report if we see this again, but so far, i've only seen this for this 1 PR, so not super urgent to figure out
